description: Our client is seeking an Executive Assistant to join their team! This individual will play an integral role supporting two senior VPs by providing high-level administrative support for company leaders to ensure they can efficiently accomplish critical tasks and company initiatives. They organize executive communications to quickly access essential information without sorting through low-priority items. The Executive Assistant will establish working relationships with high-level executives and contribute to the organization's overall efficiency. This position will be directly supporting both the SVP of Brand Strategy, as well as the SVP – Creative Service and Content Operations. This position is hybrid and based out the Burbank office.
responsibilities:
Act as the point of contact among executives, employees, clients, and other external partners to manage information flow promptly and accurately.
Provide administrative assistance, such as writing and editing e-mails, drafting memos, and preparing communications on the Executive's behalf
Submit VP(s) expense reports and keep track to ensure department expense reports are approved.
Maintain comprehensive and accurate records
Perform minor accounting duties
Answer phone calls in a polite and professional manner
Welcome visitors and identifying the purpose of their visit before directing them to the appropriate department
Place office supply orders for the department(s) as needed
To keep projects on time and on budget, the Executive Assistant works on all levels with constant communication of shifting priorities and evolving schedules. The role requires knowledge of each team's inner workings. The Executive Assistant is a self-starter that takes the initiative to anticipate the department's needs.
Facilitate new employee on-boarding protocols (ordering equipment through WB Technology, assisting with badge procurement, etc.) under the direction of the internal System Operations team
Work with VP on Brand Integration grids and tracking schedules
Coordinate and support VP on international initiatives
Manage Photo production schedule and grids
Create PowerPoint white pages for large-scale projects
Plan and arrange appointments for a wide variety of project-specific and team-related needs
This role requires strong written, verbal, and organizational skills
Confidentiality, and the ability to keep
Both senior leaders desks are very busy so need someone who can support being pulled in a number of different directions
